      • readMajors

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        An integer list of major codes.

      • readStudent

        public static Student readStudent(java.lang.String line)
        Creates and returns a Student object from a line of formatted string data.
        Parameters:
        line - a vertical bar-delimited line of student data in the format id|surname|forename|birthDate|majorCodes
        Returns:
        the data from line as a Student object

        Reads a list of Students from a file.
        Parameters:
        fileScanner - The file to read.
        Returns:
        A list of Student objects.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - file not found

      • writeStudents

        public static void writeStudents(java.util.ArrayList<Student> students,
                                 java.io.PrintStream ps)
        Writes the contents of students to a file. Overwrites or creates a new file of Student objects converted to strings.
        Parameters:
        students - List of Students.
        ps - PrintStream to write Student data to.
